DOC.brief_summary: Women polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) often overweight obese insulin resistant woman without condition may great risk develop cardiovascular disease . It know whether overweight insulin resistant component PCOS , PCOS per se lead great cardiovascular disease risk . The aim study examine cardiovascular risk marker woman PCOS versus control population match body mass index ( BMI ) , , insulin resistance
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Risk Markers Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
